body:
# Accident Investigation Report 21/2012

  
MAIB Report on the investigation of the steering control failure and subsequent contact on board the high-speed catamaran Moon Clipper on the River Thames, London resulting in injuries to several passengers and crew on 5 October 2011. Report No 21/2012. Published 8 August 2012.
